pr_title: Install kickstart package only in case of traditional systems

timeline.bodyText: nitpick: maybe we should change the debug logging 2 lines above as well.
timeline.author: mcalmer

timeline.message: In case of salt minion, there is no need to install any package. For traditionl system, only look for spacewalk-koan package for installation
